summary.span: 定义自定义请求验证的基方法。

span.span: Defines base methods for custom request validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，ASP.NET 不会验证请求，直到代码明确请求中请求一个值。By default, ASP.NET does not validate requests until code explicitly requests a value from the request. 例如，ASP.NET 不会验证查询字符串值之前的代码可访问集合。For example, ASP.NET does not validate query-string values until code accesses the collection. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 还不会验证某些类型的请求数据，例如窗体值、 cookie、 使用 HTTP 和的值已上载的文件的名称属性。By default, ASP.NET also does not validate some types of request data, such as form values, cookies, the names of files that have been uploaded using HTTP, and the value of the property. 类是可以实现以提供自定义请求验证的基类。The class is a base class that you can implement in order to provide custom request validation. 通过实现此类，可以确定何时进行验证和执行验证的请求数据的类型。By implementing this class, you can determine when validation occurs and what type of request data to perform validation on. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 提供了跨站点脚本 (XSS) 检查。By default, ASP.NET provides cross-site scripting (XSS) checks. 但是，可以补充或替换由创建 XSS 的自定义实现提供在 ASP.NET 请求验证逻辑。However, you can supplement or replace the request validation logic that is provided in ASP.NET by creating a custom implementation of the XSS. 例如，您可以编写扫描 SQL 注入式攻击，除了检查 XSS 攻击的自定义请求验证实现。For example, you can write a custom request validation implementation that scans for SQL injection attacks in addition to checking for XSS attacks. 若要创建自定义请求验证，您编写的自定义类，派生自基类。To create custom request validation, you write a custom class that derives from the base class. 然后，配置 ASP.NET 应用程序级别的 Web.config 文件中使用自定义请求验证程序。You then configure ASP.NET to use the custom request validator in the application-level Web.config file. 在 App_Code 文件夹中，在已编译的类库中的 Bin 文件夹，或在 gac 中的已编译的类库，可以将自定义类。You can put the custom class in the App_Code folder, in a compiled class library in the Bin folder, or in a compiled class library in the GAC. > [!NOTE] > 只有一种自定义请求验证类型可以为应用程序配置。Only one custom request validation type can be configured for an application. 不能配置单独的虚拟路径或页面的不同请求验证类型。It is not possible to configure a different request validation type for individual virtual paths or pages. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义请求验证程序，允许仅特定字符串，以用于查询字符串值。The following example shows how to create a custom request validator that allows only a specific string to be used for query-string values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法以执行自定义验证的请求数据。You implement this method to perform custom validation of request data. 基本行为方法就像行为 ASP.NET 在内部实现的危险字符串跨站点脚本验证检查。The base behavior of the method is like the behavior that ASP.NET implements internally to check for dangerous strings in cross-site scripting validation. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 ASP.NET 中防止跨站点脚本](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708)。For more information, see [How To: Prevent Cross-Site Scripting in ASP.NET](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708). 如果自定义验证逻辑检测到错误时，此方法应返回`false`中提供值和`validationFailureIndex`以指示导致了错误的文本的起始点。If custom validation logic detects an error, this method should return `false` and provide a value in `validationFailureIndex` to indicate the starting point of the text that caused the error. 中的值`validationFailureIndex`必须为 0 或正整数。The value in `validationFailureIndex` must be 0 or a positive integer. 在请求验证检查逻辑继续，如下所示：The logic in a request validation check proceeds as follows: - 类执行对传入数据的 null 字符删除检查。The class performs a null-character removal check on the incoming data. - 类调用方法 （基方法的默认实现） 或调用该方法的派生的版本。The class calls either the method (the default implementation of the base method) or calls a derived version of the method. - 如果方法将返回`false`若要指示验证失败，ASP.NET 将构造一个错误字符串 （如有必要） 并引发异常。If method returns `false` to indicate a validation failure, ASP.NET constructs an error string (if necessary) and throws an exception.
